item.title: US says China trade talks have stalled as Trump tariffs temporarily reinstated
item.description: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent earlier said Trump and Xi Jinping may need to get directly involved in talks.

item.title: Floods kill at least 110 people after heavy rain in Nigeria
item.description: Torrential rains in the central town of Mokwa led to the deadly floods, authorities say.

item.title: Ukraine awaiting Russia peace proposal ahead of Istanbul talks
item.description: Russia says it is sending its negotiating team to Istanbul for a second round of talks.

item.title: Suspect in South African student's murder killed in police shootout
item.description: The main suspect in the murder of Olorato Mongale was found by police on Friday morning.

item.title: New Banksy mystery location revealed
item.description: The new piece of street art depicts the shadow of a lighthouse emerging out of a bollard.
